about_the_game:
An action RPG inspired by Japanese mythology
Developed by 3Dwiz


                   
In this captivating story-driven action RPG, you will battle your way through hordes of enemies using a variety of weapons and abilities. You will also be able to choose how to develop your weapons to create your own unique playstyle. The combat system is complex, but easy to learn, allowing any player to jump in and start having fun.


                   
In addition to the intense combat, you will also be able to explore the breathtaking scapes of ancient Japan. Immerse yourself in the vibrant culture and explore the many stunning locations in the game. From the mystical places of legends to the more down to earth scapes, you will be able to experience the beauty of mythological Japan in all its glory.


In Tsukichi, you follow the story of the protagonist, Tsukichi, as she embarks on a dangerous journey to discover the mysteries behind her newfound powers. Along the way, you will traverse the beautiful landscapes of Japan and explore the secrets of a mysterious civilization that tries to infiltrate and take over Japan.

Why Play Tsukichi?

Tsukichi is a captivating game that will keep you entertained for hours. With its unique blend of story, combat, and exploration, you are sure to have an incredible experience.

So, if you're looking for an action RPG with an engaging story, intense combat, and beautiful scapes, you won't want to miss out on Tsukichi.

Join Tsukichi on her journey to discover the secrets of a dormant civilization and experience the beauty of Japan!

Whishlist now!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 750 or equivalent
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: integrated
  • VR Support: no
  • Additional Notes: n/a

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.9.4
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 4000 series or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 750 or equivalent
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: integrated
  • Additional Notes: n/a

name: Tsukichi Chronicles

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 4000 series or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 750 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: integrated
  • VR Support: no
  • Additional Notes: n/a
